title: Full-Time IT Representative & Web Software Specialist
job_overview:
Location: Remote
Compensation: $3,000/month (Full-Time)
Employment Type: Contract

About the Role:
I am seeking a talented and experienced developer to represent me, Robert Eatherly from Oklahoma, in the pursuit and operation of a full-time IT role. This position involves not only applying for suitable IT roles on my behalf but also performing the actual job duties once secured.

The ideal candidate will serve as my representative in professional communications, interviews, and ultimately, in the execution of the job itself.

Responsibilities:

Apply for IT/web development roles on behalf of Robert Eatherly

Attend virtual interviews, representing Robert in a professional and fluent manner
Fulfill daily responsibilities of any IT/web development position secured under Robert's name
Ensure confidentiality and maintain a high standard of work throughout the contract

Qualifications:
C1 level English proficiency (spoken and written)
Strong interview and communication skills
At least 3 years of experience in web software development (frontend, backend, or full stack)
High level of professionalism, integrity, and reliability
Ability to work full-time and meet all job obligations

What Youâ€™ll Receive:
Monthly compensation of $3,000 USD
Long-term contract potential
Flexible, remote working environment
Direct support and communication with Robert Eatherly

Note: This is a highly unique arrangement that requires trust, discretion, and professional excellence. All work performed will be under my name, and you must be comfortable with this condition.
